archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Women's Home & Foreign Mission Society of Luther Chapel Ledger, 1907-1922
did.abstract: Ledger contains the treasurer's reports and financial records of the Women's Home and Foreign Mission Society of Luther Chapel in Washington County, VA. Entries date from 1907 through 1922.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Women's Home and Foreign Mission Society of Luther Chapel Ledger must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Women's Home and Foreign Mission Society of Luther Chapel Ledger, Ms2011-072, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Women's Home & Foreign Mission Society of Luther Chapel Ledger was completed in September 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Ledger contains the treasurer's reports and financial records of the Women's Home and Foreign Mission Society of Luther Chapel in Washington County, VA. Financial records include membership dues and expenses for delegate travel. Entries date from 1907 through 1922.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by material type.
